thread.title: Get A Better Butt Instantly With These 10 Pairs Of Reviewer-Loved Jeans
thread.title_full: Get A Better Butt Instantly With These 10 Pairs Of Reviewer-Loved Jeans

author: @rankandstyle
title: Get A Better Butt Instantly With These 10 Pairs Of Reviewer-Loved Jeans
text:
Putting on an amazing
pair of jeans that flatters your figure in all the right places can provide an instant confidence boost. But finding said amazing pair of jeans is typically not a one-and-done sort of deal. If you've ever searched for your dream denim, you've likely had a list of criteria handy for the lengthy shopping trip: the right length, a flattering rise, a chic leg opening, a certain wash—you know the drill. And when you finally find a style that checks all of the boxes above, you're ready to declare a winner.
But nothing compares to the feeling of finding a style that ticks all those boxes while giving you a
booty boost worthy of a peach emoji. There's a science behind the styles that master it, and from the hours we've spent in the dressing room, we've learned that it has a lot to do with pocket placement, coverage, and yoke (the Y-shaped patch between the waistband and back pockets). So in the interest of sculpting our assets without having to do a single squat, we embarked on a mission to find the jeans with the best combination of derriere-sculpting details. Ahead, we've rounded up the Top 10 pairs that made the cut.
Our Method For Finding The Best Butt-Shaping Jeans
To round up this list, we turned to the help of our data-driven algorithm. This unbiased tool factors in best-selling buzz, editor recommendations, rave reviews, and more to find and rank the best products on the web. From skinny to straight, scroll on to shop the 10 best pairs of butt-shaping jeans. Prefer to watch the results rather than read them?
View our TikTok, where we walk you through the best butt-shaping jeans on the internet. [Jump To Products](#gap-high-rise-cheeky-straight-jeans)
September 7, 2023
Written By:
[Rank & Style](/bio/rank-and-style)
Product Expert:
[Georgia Jones](/bio/georgia-jones)
Top 10 Lists serve as unbiased shopping guides to the most trusted product recommendations on the internet. Products are scored and ranked using an
[algorithm](/how-we-rank-products) backed by data consumers find most valuable when making a purchase. We are reader-supported and may earn a [commission](/about) when you shop through our links.

Best Shaping Butt-Lifting Jeans
WHAT IT DOES
Finding jeans that sculpt your natural shape the way your favorite leggings do is no easy task. With power mesh panels to hold and mold, an interior-control waistband, and booty-lift construction, these flattering skinny jeans do just that.
WHO IT'S FOR
These wear-with-anything skinny jeans will work well for women with longer legs thanks to their mid-rise fit that creates the illusion of lower hips.

USER REVIEW
"I’m 5’ 4” and these are not cropped on me but they are the perfect regular jean length. The fit is amazing, not too tight but not too wide. I always get asked about these jeans when I wear them because the cut and fit are very flattering. Highly recommend these!

Best High-Rise Butt-Lifting Jeans
WHO IT'S FOR
Crafted from surplus stock, the Cynthia High Rise Jeans makes it easy for the eco-fashion lover to cut back on their carbon footprint. The nonstretch denim jeans feature a smooth, flattering high waist and a straight-cut leg so you can look as good as you feel in them.
ABOUT THE BRAND
Reformation is known for its super sustainable designs, and this pair of jeans is no different. Each of their pieces are made from ethically sourced materials, rescued deadstock fabrics, or repurposed vintage clothing.

Everlane’s Way High Jean is that one pair of boyfriend jeans your friends will be pining to borrow. From the rainbow of color options to the slimming high waist to the frayed ends, you’ll be hard-pressed to find a top that doesn’t look great with them.

Best 90s Butt-Shaping Jeans
WHY YOU’LL LOVE THEM
Remember how we told you Everlane’s Cheeky Jeans might feel familiar? If they didn’t then, they will now, because they’re making a second appearance in our list—and this time they’re giving a full-on vintage attitude.
EXTRA DETAILS
How do the ‘90s Cheeky Jeans differ from their best-selling counterparts? They offer the same butt-boosting rear fit, but with less stretch than the original version (so order a size up if you like a relaxed feel) and a little extra flare in the hem.

You can show off your shoes and your peach with these, because Levi’s Wedgie jeans are ankle length with a high-rise waist and a cheeky, lifted seat. Plus, ordering these might mark the first time you’ve ever looked forward to receiving a wedgie.
ADDITIONAL DETAILS
Don’t you just love it when a perfect pair of jeans comes in a bunch of varieties? In addition to seven different blue washes and distressed versions to choose from, the Wedgie ankle jeans are available in a black denim that’s grunge perfection.
